trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ActiveDesignSurfaceChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ActiveDesignSurfaceChanged"></xref>事件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you create an ActiveDesignSurfaceChangedEventHandler delegate, you identify a method to handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建一个 ActiveDesignSurfaceChangedEventHandler 委托时，你将标识要处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
